title: InferOpt.jl: Combinatorial Optimization enhanced Machine Learning
text:
CNN

model = generate_statistical_model(b)

Chain(
  Conv((7, 7), 3 => 64, pad=3, stride=2, bias=false),  # 9_408 parameters
  BatchNorm(64, relu),                  # 128 parameters, plus 128
  MaxPool((3, 3), pad=1, stride=2),
  Parallel(
    addact(NNlib.relu, ...),
    identity,
    Chain(
      Conv((3, 3), 64 => 64, pad=1, bias=false),  # 36_864 parameters
      BatchNorm(64),                    # 128 parameters, plus 128
      NNlib.relu,
      Conv((3, 3), 64 => 64, pad=1, bias=false),  # 36_864 parameters
      BatchNorm(64),                    # 128 parameters, plus 128
    ),
  ),
  AdaptiveMaxPool((12, 12)),
  InferOptBenchmarks.Warcraft.average_tensor,
  InferOptBenchmarks.Warcraft.neg_tensor,
  InferOptBenchmarks.Warcraft.squeeze_last_dims,
)         # Total: 9 trainable arrays, 83_520 parameters,
          # plus 6 non-trainable, 384 parameters, summarysize 330.312 KiB.

title: InferOpt.jl: Combinatorial Optimization enhanced Machine Learning
text:
Combinatorial Optimimzation algorithm

maximizer = generate_maximizer(b)

dijkstra_maximizer (generic function with 1 method)

title: InferOpt.jl: Combinatorial Optimization enhanced Machine Learning
text:
Layer and loss

using InferOpt

perturbed_maximizer = PerturbedMultiplicative(maximizer; ε=0.1, nb_samples=10)
loss = FenchelYoungLoss(perturbed_maximizer)

FenchelYoungLoss(PerturbedMultiplicative(dijkstra_maximizer, 0.1, 10, Random.MersenneTwister, nothing, Normal(0, 1)))

title: InferOpt.jl: Combinatorial Optimization enhanced Machine Learning
text:
Training

using Flux

opt_state = Flux.setup(Adam(1e-3), model)
for epoch in 1:50
    val, grads = Flux.withgradient(model) do m
        sum(loss(m(x), y) for (x, y, _) in train_dataset)
    end
    Flux.update!(opt_state, model, grads[1])
end

title: InferOpt.jl: Combinatorial Optimization enhanced Machine Learning
text:
Prediction

(x, y_true, θ_true) = test_dataset[13]; θ = model(x); y = UInt8.(maximizer(θ));
plot_data(x, y_true, θ_true)
